documents.name: stats.bitlyTotalClicks
documents.description: Sum of all Bitly link clicks for event
documents.label: Total Bitly Clicks

documents.name: stats.bitlyTopReferrer
documents.description: Platform with most clicks (e.g., Instagram, Facebook)
documents.label: Top Referrer Platform

documents.name: stats.bitlyTopDomain
documents.description: Specific domain with most clicks (e.g., l.instagram.com)
documents.label: Top Referring Domain

documents.name: stats.sportsDbStrTeam
documents.description: Official full team name from SportsDB
documents.label: Full Team Name

documents.name: stats.sportsDbLastSynced
documents.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last SportsDB sync
documents.label: Last Synced

documents.name: stats.allImages
documents.description: Sum of Remote, Hostess, and Selfies
documents.label: Total Images

documents.name: stats.totalFans
documents.description: Total fans counted across remote and on-site (Remote + Stadium)
documents.label: Total Fans

documents.name: stats.bitlyClickRate
documents.description: Percentage of attendees who clicked Bitly links
documents.label: Bitly Click-Through Rate

documents.name: stats.bitlyMobileRate
documents.description: Percentage of Bitly clicks from mobile devices
documents.label: Bitly Mobile Usage Rate

documents.name: stats.visitQrCode
documents.label: QR Code Visits
documents.description: Number of visitors who scanned QR code to access event page

documents.name: stats.visitShortUrl
documents.label: Short URL Visits
documents.description: Number of visitors who clicked Bitly short URL

documents.name: stats.visitWeb
documents.label: Direct Web Visits
documents.description: Number of visitors who accessed event page directly via web URL

documents.name: stats.uniqueUsers
documents.description: Total number of unique users who interacted with the event
documents.label: Unique Users

documents.name: stats.ventFacebook
documents.description: Manual count of visitors from Facebook campaign
documents.label: Vent: Facebook

documents.name: stats.ventInstagram
documents.description: Manual count of visitors from Instagram campaign
documents.label: Vent: Instagram

documents.name: stats.ventGoogle
documents.description: Manual count of visitors from Google campaign
documents.label: Vent: Google

documents.name: stats.ventQr
documents.description: Manual count of visitors from QR code scans
documents.label: Vent: QR Code

documents.name: stats.ventUrl
documents.description: Manual count of visitors from direct URL access
documents.label: Vent: Direct URL

documents.name: stats.ventIos
documents.description: Manual count of visitors from iOS devices
documents.label: Vent: iOS

documents.name: stats.ventAndroid
documents.description: Manual count of visitors from Android devices
documents.label: Vent: Android

documents.name: stats.ventCtaPopup
documents.description: Manual count of interactions with CTA popup
documents.label: Vent: CTA Popup

documents.name: stats.ventCtaEmail
documents.description: Manual count of email CTA click-throughs
documents.label: Vent: CTA Email
